entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear this evening then partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
